dn22:8.1: kaṅkehi vā khajjamānaṃ sunakhehi vā khajjamānaṃ byagghehi vā khajjamānaṃ dīpīhi vā khajjamānaṃ siṅgālehi vā khajjamānaṃ → suvānehi vā khajjamānaṃ sigālehi vā khajjamānaṃ (si, sya-all, km), supāṇehi vā khajjamānaṃ sigālehi vā khajjamānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn22:9.4: aññena phāsukaṭṭhikaṃ aññena piṭṭhiṭṭhikaṃ aññena khandhaṭṭhikaṃ → aññena kaṭaṭṭhikaṃ aññena piṭṭhaṭṭhikaṃ aññena kaṇḍakaṭṭhikaṃ aññena phāsukaṭṭhikaṃ aññena uraṭṭhikaṃ aññena aṃsaṭṭhikaṃ aññena bāhuṭṭhikaṃ (sya-all, km) | aññena kaṭiṭṭhikaṃ → aññena piṭṭhiṭṭhikaṃ aññena kaṭaṭṭhikaṃ aññena khandhaṭṭhikaṃ aññena gīvaṭṭhikaṃ (si)
dn22:18.2: dukkho → appiyehi …pe… vippayogo dukkhotipāṭho ceva taṃniddeso ca katthaci na dissati, aṭṭhakathāyampi taṃsaṃvaṇṇanā
